div.h2: NHS Data Model and Dictionary Discharge Method

div.p: The method of discharge from a Hospital Provider Spell.

This code system https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/CodeSystem/CareConnect-DischargeMethod-1 defines the following codes:

tr.td: Patient discharged on clinical advice or with clinical consent
Patient discharged him/herself or was discharged by a relative or advocate
Patient discharged by mental health review tribunal, Home Secretary or Court

National Codes 6 and 7 have been introduced for the Mental Health Services Data Set only to add further granularity to National Code 2. However, National Code 2 is still valid for the Mental Health Services Data Set where extra detail cannot be collected. National Codes 6 and 7 are NOT valid in any other data set including Commissioning Data Set version 6-2.
